data.text:
Urban residents globally:
🏠 1950 – 746M
🏘️ 2018 – 4.2B
🏙️ 2050 – 6.3B

Follow this week's #CPD51 meeting of #UNPopulation experts to find out more: https://t.co/GlyKRdEUNR https://t.co/IcEsZy9UTX

Noncommunicable diseases kill 40M people each year.

#BeatNCDs by: 
being physically active 🤸🏾‍♂️⛹🏼‍♀️🚴‍♂️
choosing healthy food 🥦🥑🥕
saying #NoTobacco 🚭
reducing harmful alcohol use 

More from @WHO: https://t.co/TZ34wYbhcs https://t.co/w9vQnAfmIl

We join @unwto in welcoming Lionel Messi as Ambassador for Responsible Tourism!

The renowned ⚽️ player will work to promote the benefits of responsible travel: https://t.co/GF0WFKTzwd https://t.co/YiyEYud5m9
Good climate action news ➡️ Strategy for reduction of greenhouse gas emissions from ships on agenda at IMO's Marine Environment Protection Committee this week. https://t.co/yoAHkZZLX2
Starting soon: Security Council meeting on the situation in the Middle East. Watch live: https://t.co/WhwXXmUzNN

"Liberia is an inspiring example of what the best of humanity can offer to overcome some of the worst of what humanity can do." - @AminaJMohammed on Liberia's promising future: https://t.co/fFDLmcqbPm

By 2050, 2 in 3 people will live in urban areas. Smart urbanization strategies can help achieve sustainable cities. Follow Monday's #CPD51 meeting of #UNPopulation experts to find out more: https://t.co/GlyKRdWvFp https://t.co/24TMNZ0Ocm
Continues this week in New York: Disarmament Commission, annual session [through 20 April]: https://t.co/kZsaPYkJxa https://t.co/SqvsMXa116
What's happening this week at the UN? Commission on Population & Development, Int'l Day of Human Space Flight & more. List of events here: https://t.co/HDzhfjjC8u https://t.co/g6gTtdplkP

If you can't reuse it, refuse it!

Get more ideas to #BeatPollution & help achieve #CleanSeas: https://t.co/nkq6K6Hsp5 via @UNEP https://t.co/gIBcYffWXI
Our Headquarters are in NYC, but the work of the UN touches lives of people all over the 🌏. Here's what we do: https://t.co/MGT7G5Mqxj https://t.co/lGT88Q3Uut
Papua New Guinea: @WFP airlifted life-saving energy biscuits to people affected by earthquake: https://t.co/D1VGyRg7dU via @WFP_Media https://t.co/kieR8E6jNH
UN Peacekeepers leave their families behind and travel far from home to help others. More on the brave men & women #ServingForPeace here: https://t.co/lZYeCp9I0z https://t.co/uIPhkz2e7c
Feeling lazy this #SustainableSunday? Here is what you can do to help achieve the #GlobalGoals without leaving your couch 🛋️: https://t.co/K0aDMReTMd https://t.co/DX1oaLP9bc
Meet military & police officers from Egypt 🇪🇬 who are #ServingForPeace around the 🌎 with @UNPeacekeeping in our new @Instagram story ➡️ https://t.co/UH4OQBPYqm https://t.co/VFVLxkGL40

🎥 Are you a young filmmaker?

Submit your short video on migration, social inclusion & diversity to @PluralPlus: https://t.co/mDnM0T3Yi3 #PLURALplus18 https://t.co/TOLDV3tv0l

One world

7.5 billion unique faces

Diversity is a strength, not a threat.

Here's how you can #FightRacism: https://t.co/QfR5x14GnL https://t.co/VHjL87JFvt
Climate change is increasing the intensity and frequency of extreme weather events. Get ideas for climate action here: https://t.co/K0aDMQXinD #GlobalGoals https://t.co/C7yaTnuTQF
24 years on, see the scars of the #RwandaGenocide in this portrait series: https://t.co/uO8EstlBy5 #Kwibuka24 https://t.co/X1XGUvoHWR

In the last 70 years:
- global life expectancy has increased by 25 years,
- smallpox has disappeared,
- polio is on the verge of eradication.

Happy 70th birthday @WHO! https://t.co/W7XEcS2vLt #HealthForAll https://t.co/U5XGfRUBoN
More than 800K people perished in the #RwandaGenocide 24 years ago. Here's how you can get involved in supporting survivors: https://t.co/gHcBNBj4JK #Kwibuka24 https://t.co/qmPa6C5YM6
Here's a list of 10 ways the UN makes a difference in the lives of millions every day. See what else we do: https://t.co/MGT7G5Mqxj https://t.co/0JSEeQh0Mq

"We need to make every effort to bring to an end the plight of the Rohingya, one of the most serious humanitarian crises we have ever faced."

-- @UN_GP_RtoP's Adama Dieng on Saturday's #RwandaGenocide anniversary: https://t.co/saUCifaJAK https://t.co/PXalfHhEge
UN Peacekeepers come from different countries, cultures & backgrounds -- but share a common purpose to protect the most vulnerable. https://t.co/lZYeCoS6BZ #ServingForPeace https://t.co/9fGD7HdWJI
"Today, we join @WHO in recommitting to ensure that everyone, everywhere, gets the health services they need." -- @antonioguterres https://t.co/36ulJCVyds #HealthForAll https://t.co/Wc1upWvjL7
24 years after the #RwandaGenocide, hear from survivors & find out about efforts to prevent genocide: https://t.co/EvdyyAR9EY #Kibukwa24 https://t.co/NObvzKUV8f
Universal Health Coverage means getting the health services you need, when & where you need them without facing financial hardship: https://t.co/NIcyJ44KV2 #HealthForAll https://t.co/2W0qtNd4bC

Sport can: 
🤸‍♀️ inspire
🧘‍♂️ heal
⚽️ bring people together... 

AND give hope to someone far from home. Join @refugees in a world tour of solidarity with those forced to flee: https://t.co/DuMkhqaHO7 #IDSDP2018 https://t.co/GGrVdcVoc9
What makes an Improvised Explosive Device tick? Watch this week’s @UNMAS demining demonstration at UNHQ to find out: https://t.co/egLNPAmSUN #IMAD2018 https://t.co/OcijWVooJp
On Friday's Int'l Day of Sport for Development & Peace, see how sport can help promote gender equality & peace: https://t.co/SoNXxPMJ7N #IDSDP2018 https://t.co/H2Dzxscv98

Egypt provides nearly 3200 military and police officers to @UNPeacekeeping. We thank these brave peacekeepers for their service & sacrifice. https://t.co/lZYeCoS6BZ #ServingForPeace https://t.co/yA5yELWf7n
Women & girls all over the 🌍 are scoring goals as they strive towards development & peace on and off the field! https://t.co/SoNXxPv8gf #IDSDP2018 #WomenInSport https://t.co/olQWo0hrYN
New exhibit at UNHQ showcases how @UNMAS works every day for a #MineFree world. View it here: https://t.co/2qnhYLtUnd https://t.co/SkisPzNAKm

"The conditions are appalling." -- @UschiMuller
Find out what @UNOCHA is doing to help Rohingya refugees: https://t.co/1FjNGu2EvI https://t.co/fR8ZfQF8RT

https://t.co/vat0kzke6j
📷: #TBT to 1954 quote from 2nd UN Secretary-General Dag Hammarskjöld. Find out more about the mission & work of the UN: https://t.co/W8kYO3vzU3 https://t.co/STw2dz5pKF
UN Peacekeepers leave their families behind and travel far from home to help others. More on the brave men & women #ServingForPeace here: https://t.co/lZYeCoS6BZ https://t.co/Ua0ITIZg0g

Health is a human right. No one should get sick & die just because they are poor, or because they cannot access the health services they need. It’s time for #HealthForAll https://t.co/yBhjCIDHRn https://t.co/7sbP72SwHT
Results of tests by @OPCW of samples from nerve agent attack in the UK are expected next week: https://t.co/alCxGSDLZA https://t.co/IVYOaws1D7

Dr. Martin Luther King was a visionary civil rights leader and the values he lived & died for are shared by the UN. 

Stand up against racism & intolerance today and every day: https://t.co/siDRqxCavU https://t.co/z0ZSoz3pAk

"People are in desperate need of protection from explosive hazards & the deadly legacy these leave behind" -- @UNMAS Global Advocate Daniel Craig on #IMAD2018 https://t.co/IGeJTgpRzb https://t.co/UMY8V6HvCv

Special guests came to UNHQ in NYC this week: Wild geese visited the "Good Defeats Evil" sculpture, a symbol of disarmament & nuclear non-proliferation ➡️ https://t.co/tt2zvm0os3 https://t.co/4LUCBpMB2I
Wednesday is Mine Awareness Day. See how @UNMAS works every day to protect civilians from explosive hazards: https://t.co/IGeJTgHsXL #MineFree https://t.co/JJdhVQnuoJ
Yemen is one of the most food insecure countries in the world. Find out what @WFP is doing to help: https://t.co/FkPgoXSF6Q https://t.co/sIwD5Z3x0q
Happy birthday to our Messenger of Peace, Jane Goodall, and thank you for your tireless commitment to protecting the environment. https://t.co/7IqM2jdcRv #GlobalGoals https://t.co/G4bMKRCP7P

.@antonioguterres condemns Tuesday's attack against @UN_CAR in the Central African Republic. He offers his deepest condolences to the families of those killed & wishes a swift recovery to the injured. https://t.co/I2VE1Htkws

“In our turbulent world, mine action is a concrete step towards peace” –- @antonioguterres ahead of Wednesday's Mine Awareness Day.
More about #IMAD2018 👉 https://t.co/zYaoL9AjBi https://t.co/0CpTYtFGJL

💰Thriving economy
👩‍🏭 Decent jobs
👫 Equal pay

Find out how the private sector is contributing to the #GlobalGoals at the @UNECOSOC Partnership Forum: https://t.co/8ETXvl9R4g https://t.co/scQMhPABqr

As the conflict in Yemen enters its 4th year, more than 22 million people need humanitarian aid & protection.
We must see action to end the conflict.
-- @antonioguterres https://t.co/pdMVqkg4yg https://t.co/iklWFaxgeu
Access to safe drinking water is a basic human right. Because #EveryDrop💧 matters, the "Clean Water Here" exhibit is on display at UNHQ in NYC 👉 https://t.co/u2k7UjuwlV https://t.co/SkYPHmKsaw

Now is the time for all of us to come together & take climate action. 

Find out how to join the #Talanoa4ambition Dialogue to supoprt the #ParisAgreement ➡️ https://t.co/ne8qtLNvrV https://t.co/gVY7yoqqqJ
UN Peacekeepers go where no one else will to keep the peace, restore stability, protect civilians & much more. https://t.co/lZYeCoS6BZ #ServingForPeace https://t.co/yvGoSRdAUv

Over 22 million people in Yemen are in need of humanitarian aid. The UN is working tirelessly to deliver life-saving assistance. 
Find out more from @UNOCHA: https://t.co/zNXsZnvz8e https://t.co/AhsWXKQYjk
The UN does not tolerate or condone sexual exploitation nor abuse. Here is how the UN is working to make zero tolerance a reality: https://t.co/G3A62cmaC8 https://t.co/i2TJRNLUDD
People with autism have the equal right to make their own decisions & choices like everybody else. Key facts: https://t.co/fbSCMOh5XY #AutismDay2018 https://t.co/ObniDFdd6l

🔹 Equal rights
🔹 Non-discrimination
🔹 Tolerance

The values of the UN Charter are values for us all to live by.

Over 75% of Yemen's population needs of humanitarian aid. 
The UN is working to facilitate a political solution & to deliver life-saving assistance: https://t.co/HGXGCvItGk https://t.co/gJIIyDnkRa
Chloe, the UN therapy dog, is joining us in celebrating Water Action Decade to highlight the need for safe 🚰 access. #EveryDrop counts! https://t.co/5aGZr4YFdf https://t.co/Vf3OWLm0jT

📷: #FBF to 1962

Liberia: Successful 15-year @unpeacekeeping mission closes this Friday after:
🔹 Supporting safe return home of 1M+ refugees & displaced people
🔹 Assisting elections
🔹 Helping restore stability & security

https://t.co/wdaYT2Lwl0
Human rights are for everyone – no matter who you are or whom you love! #StandUp4HumanRights today & every day https://t.co/Ljui9GqDYQ https://t.co/zuewosfJlD

"I think there is an opportunity for a peaceful solution to something that, a few months ago, was haunting us as the biggest danger we were facing."
--@antonioguterres on announcement of inter‑Korean summit. https://t.co/stXeGqgD6e https://t.co/q0vAvg8lFa

Clean, green energy is more affordable and competitive than ever.
Our problem is not that we do not know what to do -- it is how quickly we can do it.
--@antonioguterres on the urgency of climate action. Read his remarks in full here: https://t.co/Lx6kkK6H9G https://t.co/Krn8crYIBq

.@antonioguterres has appointed Rosemary DiCarlo of USA as new @UN_DPA chief. She succeeds Jeffrey Feltman, who will give his final press briefing Thurs 2pm EDT. Watch live: https://t.co/WhwXXmCYWf https://t.co/NByWJmUJ9d

Racism, xenophobia and intolerance are problems prevalent in all societies. But every day, each & every one of us can #FightRacism & #Standup4humanrights. https://t.co/siDRqxkzEm https://t.co/UZES3jnyE1
There is more than enough food in the 🌎 to feed everyone, yet 815M people go hungry. @WFP is working for #ZeroHunger: https://t.co/nlUtZ49kAp https://t.co/ar2bOz3cQ3
